metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38604 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In librt in the GNU C Library (aka glibc) through 2.34,sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/mq_notify.c mishandles certain NOTIFY_REMOVED data,leading to a NULL pointer dereference. NOTE: this vulnerability wasintroduced as a side effect of the CVE-2021-33574 fix.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glibc-source - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc-bin - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-amd64 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-i386 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-prof - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-s390 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-x32 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
locales - 2.34-0ubuntu3
locales-all - 2.34-0ubuntu3
nscd - 2.34-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glibc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-0ubuntu3').
